00027 #include <cfp/error.h>
00028 
00029 using namespace cfp;
00030 
00031 Error::Error(const std::string& msg, size_t start, size_t length)
00032         : msg_m(msg),
00033           start_m(start), 
00034           length_m(length)
00035 {
00036 }
00037 
00038 Error::Error(size_t start, size_t length)
00039         : msg_m(),
00040           start_m(start), 
00041           length_m(length)
00042 {
00043 }
00044 
00045 Error::~Error() throw()
00046 {
00047 }
00048 
00049 void Error::setMessage(const std::string& msg)
00050 {
00051         msg_m.assign(msg);
00052 }
00053 
00054 const char *
00055 Error::what() const throw()
00056 {
00057         return whatStr().c_str();
00058 }
00059 
00060 const std::string&
00061 Error::whatStr() const throw()
00062 {
00063         return msg_m;
00064 }
00065 
00066 const char*
00067 Error::what(size_t& start, size_t& length) const throw()
00068 {
00069         return whatStr(start, length).c_str();
00070 }
00071 
00072 const std::string&
00073 Error::whatStr(size_t& start, size_t& length) const throw()
00074 {
00075         start = start_m;
00076         length = length_m;
00077         return whatStr();
00078 }
